---
title: OneLogin SCIM v2.0
sidebar_label: OneLogin SCIM v2.0
---

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # OneLogin SCIM v2.0

translations.zh-CN: # OneLogin SCIM v2.0 配置指南

segments.source_content: The following guide will walk you through the process of configuring SAML Jackson to use the OneLogin SCIM v2.0 directory provider.

translations.zh-CN: 本指南将逐步介绍如何配置 SAML Jackson 以使用 OneLogin SCIM v2.0 目录服务提供商。

segments.source_content: ### Create OneLogin Application

translations.zh-CN: ### 创建 OneLogin 应用

segments.source_content: Click **Applications** from the top navigation menu and click **Add App** button.

translations.zh-CN: 点击顶部导航菜单中的 **Applications**，然后点击 **Add App** 按钮。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 1](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/1.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤1](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/1.png)

segments.source_content: Search for **SCIM** from the search box and choose the app called **SCIM Provisioner with SAML (SCIM V2 Enterprise)** from the list of apps.

translations.zh-CN: 在搜索框中输入 **SCIM**，从应用列表中选择名为 **SCIM Provisioner with SAML (SCIM V2 Enterprise)** 的应用。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 2](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/2.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤2](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/2.png)

segments.source_content: Give the app a name and click the **Save** button.

translations.zh-CN: 为应用命名后点击 **Save** 按钮。

segments.source_content: ![iOneLogin SCIM Step 3](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/3.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤3](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/3.png)

segments.source_content: At this stage, you've successfully created the OneLogin SCIM app.

translations.zh-CN: 至此，您已成功创建 OneLogin SCIM 应用。

segments.source_content: ### Enable OneLogin SCIM Provisioning

translations.zh-CN: ### 启用 OneLogin SCIM 配置

segments.source_content: In your application, click the **Configuration** tab on the left.

translations.zh-CN: 在您的应用中，点击左侧的 **Configuration** 选项卡。

segments.source_content: Enter the following information:

translations.zh-CN: 输入以下信息：

segments.source_content:
- SCIM Base URL
- SCIM Bearer Token

translations.zh-CN:
- SCIM 基础URL
- SCIM Bearer Token

segments.source_content: You'll receive these information from Jackson when you create the directory sync connection either via the API or the Admin Portal.

translations.zh-CN: 这些信息将在您通过 API 或管理门户创建目录同步连接时由 Jackson 提供。

segments.source_content: Click the button **Enable** to test the connection to see if the credentials are correct and click the button to **Save** to save the credentials.

translations.zh-CN: 点击 **Enable** 按钮测试连接以验证凭证是否正确，然后点击 **Save** 按钮保存凭证。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 4](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/4.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤4](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/4.png)

segments.source_content: Next click the **Provisioning** tab and check the **Enable provisioning** checkbox. Click the **Save** button to save the changes.

translations.zh-CN: 接着点击 **Provisioning** 选项卡，勾选 **Enable provisioning** 复选框。点击 **Save** 按钮保存更改。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 5](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/5.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤5](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/5.png)

segments.source_content: Next click the **Parameters** tab and select the row **Groups** from the table.

translations.zh-CN: 然后点击 **Parameters** 选项卡，从表格中选择 **Groups** 行。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 6](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/6.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤6](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/6.png)

segments.source_content: In the popup window, check the box **Include in User Provisioning** and click the **Save** button.

translations.zh-CN: 在弹出窗口中勾选 **Include in User Provisioning** 选项，点击 **Save** 按钮。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 7](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/7.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤7](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/7.png)

segments.source_content: ### Assign Users

translations.zh-CN: ### 分配用户

segments.source_content: In order to assign users to your app, select **Users** from the top navigation menu and choose the user you want to assign to the app.

translations.zh-CN: 要为应用分配用户，请从顶部导航菜单中选择 **Users**，然后选择要分配的用户。

segments.source_content: From the user page, click the **Application** tab on the left and click the plus sign.

translations.zh-CN: 在用户页面中，点击左侧的 **Application** 选项卡，然后点击加号图标。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 8](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/8.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤8](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/8.png)

segments.source_content: A popup window will show you the list of apps that you can assign the user to. Select the app you created earlier and click the **Continue** button.

translations.zh-CN: 弹出窗口将显示可分配的应用列表。选择您之前创建的应用，点击 **Continue** 按钮。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 9](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/9.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤9](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/9.png)

segments.source_content: Click **Save** on the next modal window to confirm the assignment.

translations.zh-CN: 在下一个模态窗口中点击 **Save** 确认分配。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 10](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/10.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤10](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/10.png)

segments.source_content: Depending on your configuration, You may have to approve the assignment.

translations.zh-CN: 根据您的配置，可能需要审批此次分配。

segments.source_content: If you see a text **Pending** in the table, click that text. That'll bring up a modal window, click the button **Approve** to approve the assignment.

translations.zh-CN: 如果在表格中看到显示为**待处理**的文本，请点击该文本。这将弹出一个模态窗口，点击**批准**按钮以确认分配。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 11](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/11.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤11](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/11.png)

segments.source_content: At this point, the user will be assigned to the app.

translations.zh-CN: 至此，该用户将被成功分配至应用程序。

segments.source_content: ### Push Groups

translations.zh-CN: ### 推送群组

segments.source_content: In order to push groups to your app, you've to create a new **Role** in your app.

translations.zh-CN: 若要将群组推送至您的应用程序，需先在应用中创建新**角色**。

segments.source_content: In the top navigation, select **Users** and then **Roles** from the dropdown.

translations.zh-CN: 在顶部导航栏中选择**用户**，然后从下拉菜单中选择**角色**。

segments.source_content: Click **New Role** to create a new role.

translations.zh-CN: 点击**新建角色**以创建新角色。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 12](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/12.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤12](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/12.png)

segments.source_content: Enter a name for the role, select the app you created earlier and click the **Save** button.

translations.zh-CN: 输入角色名称，选择先前创建的应用程序，点击**保存**按钮。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 13](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/13.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤13](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/13.png)

segments.source_content: Click the **Users** tab for the role and search for the user you want to assign the role to.

translations.zh-CN: 点击角色的**用户**标签页，搜索需分配该角色的用户。

segments.source_content: Click the button **Add To Role** to assign the user to the role and click the **Save** button.

translations.zh-CN: 点击**添加至角色**按钮分配用户，随后点击**保存**按钮。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 14](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/14.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤14](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/14.png)

segments.source_content: Click **Save** in the next modal to confirm the assignment.

translations.zh-CN: 在后续模态窗口中点击**保存**以确认分配。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 15](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/15.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤15](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/15.png)

segments.source_content: Go back to your app and click the **Rule** tab on the left and click the **Add Rule** button.

translations.zh-CN: 返回您的应用程序，点击左侧**规则**标签页，点击**添加规则**按钮。

segments.source_content: Give the rule a name. Under the **Actions**, select the **Set Groups in your-app-name** from the dropdown, then select for each **role** with values that matches **your-app-name**. Click the **Save** button.

translations.zh-CN: 为规则命名。在**操作**部分，从下拉菜单中选择**在您的应用名称中设置群组**，然后为每个**角色**选择与**您的应用名称**匹配的值。点击**保存**按钮。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 16](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/16.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤16](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/16.png)

segments.source_content: Click the **Users** tab on the left, you may see **Pending** provisions in the table. Click that text to approve the assignment.

translations.zh-CN: 点击左侧**用户**标签页，可能会在表格中看到**待处理**的配置项。点击该文本以批准分配。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 17](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/17.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤17](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/17.png)

segments.source_content: Click **Approve** in the next modal to confirm the assignment.

translations.zh-CN: 在后续模态窗口中点击**批准**以确认分配。

segments.source_content: ![OneLogin SCIM Step 18](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/18.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![OneLogin SCIM 步骤18](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/onelogin/18.png)

segments.source_content: ### FAQ

translations.zh-CN: ### 常见问题

segments.source_content: #### Why don't I see any event when a group is removed in OneLogin?

translations.zh-CN: #### 为什么OneLogin中删除群组时没有触发任何事件？

segments.source_content: It is a known issue with OneLogin SCIM. OneLogin does not dispatch a specific deprovisioning event for groups that are deleted, so you won't see any event such as `group.deleted` or `group.user_removed` when a group is removed. It is recommended to remove the users from the group before deleting the group itself from the SCIM application.

translations.zh-CN: 这是OneLogin SCIM的已知问题。OneLogin不会为已删除的群组发送特定的取消配置事件，因此当群组被移除时，您不会收到诸如`group.deleted`或`group.user_removed`之类的事件。建议在从SCIM应用程序中删除群组之前，先移除群组中的所有用户。
